remarks: An ordinal number smaller than the minimum of a set of ordinal numbers does not have the property determining that set. ` ps ` is the wff resulting from the substitution of ` A ` for ` x ` in wff ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2003.)
statement:
onnminsb.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
onnminsb $p |- ( A e. On -> ( A e. |^| { x e. On | ph } -> -. ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ps x $.
